com.i2group.apollo.infoservice.transport

Class DataSourcesAndSchema

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.i2group.apollo.infoservice.transport.DataSourcesAndSchema

  • public final class DataSourcesAndSchema
extends Object
    A container for information about the primary and external data sources that i2 Analyze services interact with.
    Since:
    3.0

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DataSourcesAndSchema(Schema schema, DataSource masterDatasource, DataSourceList externalDataSources)
      Constructs a new DataSourcesAndSchema, initializing all mandatory fields.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DataSourceList getExternalDataSources()
      Gets a DataSourceList containing the external DataSources that the current user has access to.
      DataSource getMasterDataSource()
      Gets the primary DataSource for this i2 Analyze deployment.
      Schema getSchema()
      Gets the Schema that all of the DataSources described by this DataSourcesAndSchema use.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DataSourcesAndSchema

        public DataSourcesAndSchema(Schema schema,
                            DataSource masterDatasource,
                            DataSourceList externalDataSources)
        Constructs a new DataSourcesAndSchema, initializing all mandatory fields.
        Parameters:
        schema - The Schema that all of the DataSources described by this DataSourcesAndSchema use.
        masterDatasource - The primary DataSource for this i2 Analyze deployment.
        externalDataSources - A DataSourceList containing the external DataSources that the current user has access to.

    • Method Detail

      • getSchema

        public Schema getSchema()
        Gets the Schema that all of the DataSources described by this DataSourcesAndSchema use.
        Returns:
        See above.

        public DataSource getMasterDataSource()
        Gets the primary DataSource for this i2 Analyze deployment.
        Returns:
        See above.

      • getExternalDataSources

        public DataSourceList getExternalDataSources()
        Gets a DataSourceList containing the external DataSources that the current user has access to.
        Returns:
        See above.
